meaningMnemonic: Something that is <kanji>obsolete</kanji> will end in <kanji>extinction</kanji>. Join in the calls for its <vocabulary>abolition</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>elimination</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>extinction</vocabulary>, whatever it is.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
